title: Relgious and Political Meaning of Parthenon

content.question: The images show an overview and a detail of the Parthenon. Why was this site chosen for the Parthenon? Using specific visual and contextual evidence, explain how the sculptural program of the Parthenon addresses both the religious function of the building and its political significance.

frqParts.text: The images show an overview and a detail of the Parthenon. Why was this site chosen for the Parthenon? Using specific visual and contextual evidence, explain how the sculptural program of the Parthenon addresses both the religious function of the building and its political significance.

topic.text: 2.3: Purpose and Audience in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
